import numpy as np # linear algebra

import os

    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.7f93dddd: # Data Analysis on Suicides in India(2001-2012)
source.887f809c:
*The above data had information about the suicide cases in India from 2001-2012. There are 5 parameters(Suicide causes, Education status, By means adopted, Professional profile, Social status) besides gender and age group to get brief information about the person who committed suicide across India in these years. The tables below depict the reason for maximum suicides in India with different factors taken into account which are as follows*:-

                                                    TABLE 1
                                                    
                         Age Group                Parameter                       (Maximum Type in each Parameter)
                                                                                                    
                           0-14                 Suicide causes                        Causes Not known
                                                Education status                      No Information
                                                By means adopted                      By Other means (please specify)
                                                Professional profile                  Student
                                                Social status                         No Information
                            
                           15-29                Suicide causes                        Family Problems
                                                Education status                      No Information
                                                By means adopted                      By Hanging
                                                Professional profile                  House Wife
                                                Social status                         No Information
                                              
                           30-44                Suicide causes                        Family Problems
                                                Education status                      No Information
                                                By means adopted                      By Hanging
                                                Professional profile                  House Wife
                                                Social status                         No Information
                           
                           45-59                Suicide causes                        Family Problems
                                                Education status                      No Information
                                                By means adopted                      By Hanging
                                                Professional profile                  Farming/Agriculture Activity
                                                Social status                         No Information
                           
                           60+                  Suicide causes                        Other Prolonged Illness
                                                Education status                      No Information
                                                By means adopted                      By Hanging
                                                Professional profile                  Others (Please Specify)
                                                Social status                         No Information
                                                               
                                                               
                                                     TABLE 2
                                                    
                         Gender                   Parameter                      (Maximum Type in each Parameter)
                                                                                                    
                          Male                  Suicide causes                      Family Problems
                                                Education status                    Primary
                                                By means adopted                    By Hanging
                                                Professional profile                Farming/Agriculture Activity
                                                Social status                       Married
                            
                          Female                Suicide causes                      Family Problems
                                                Education status                    Primary
                                                By means adopted                    By Hanging
                                                Professional profile                House Wife
                                                Social status                       Married


*From the above two tables and data given, the conclusion taken is most people have used hanging as a means to suicide, and the second means is by consuming insecticides or poison. The cause of suicide is mostly family problems and somewhat due to diseases. Most of the cases are from married and divorce or widow peoples. Women who are housewives, people engaged in farming/agricultural activities, children in primary, middle school, or no education suicided the most. The number of suicides increased in 2004 and from 2008 onwards took a massive increment. Males and the age group between 15-45 were involved in most suicides. Analysis of statewise and union territories is hard to interpret as the data is almost the same for all states and union territories for five parameters. The inefficiency of not knowing the exact reason for suicide or any of the five parameters for the cause of suicide is a drawback.*
